title: Phase and Interface Engineering of a Ru-Sn Nanocatalyst for Enhanced Alkaline Hydrogen Oxidation Reaction

As the anode reaction of anion exchange membrane fuel cells (AEMFCs), hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR) has attracted great attention, however, suffers from the low kinetics in alkaline condition. In this...
